description:
Tomo`s misunderstanding gets the Science Club in trouble once again, and as punishment, the members are made to clean the school pool. However, Tomoharu and the others follow a suspicious koala and find themselves in a labyrinthine underground tunnel system. Led by the koala, Tomoharu and the others find themselves at the Rakuroa ruins...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shoumetsu no Sekai no Kioku no Zangai
The World of Destruction and the Ruins of Memories
消滅の世界と記憶の残骸
